thread.section_title: Mabel's Labels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mabel's Labels | mabelslabels.com
thread.title: Sandy

author: Sandy
title: Sandy
text: Very friendly customer service rep. The product is "as advertised" and served my purpose perfectly. However, if I hadn't checked the online confirmation, the name would have been mis-spelled. When I called to correct it, again, the service representative was very pleasant, most apologetic and corrected it without hesitation. I will use the service again and have no hesitation recommending it to others.
